org.mockito.ReturnValues

Packages that use ReturnValues
org.mockito Mockito is a mock library for java - see Mockito class for for usage.

Fields in org.mockito declared as ReturnValues
static ReturnValues Mockito.RETURNS_DEFAULTS
          Default ReturnValues used by the framework.
static ReturnValues Mockito.RETURNS_SMART_NULLS
          Optional ReturnValues to be used with Mockito.mock(Class, ReturnValues)
 

Methods in org.mockito with parameters of type ReturnValues
static
<T> T
Mockito.mock(java.lang.Class<T> classToMock, ReturnValues returnValues)
          Creates mock with a specified strategy for its return values.

Uses of ReturnValues in org.mockito.internal.returnvalues
 

Classes in org.mockito.internal.returnvalues that implement ReturnValues
 class EmptyReturnValues
          Used by default by every Mockito mock.
 class GloballyConfiguredReturnValues
          ReturnValues from global configuration
 class MoreEmptyReturnValues
          It's likely this implementation will be used by default by every Mockito 2.0 mock.

          Optional ReturnValues to be used with Mockito.mock(Class, ReturnValues)
